title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3166/83 of 26 October 1983 on applications for aid from the Guidance Section of the European Agricultural Guidance and Guarantee Fund for investment projects in fisheries and aquaculture
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 3166/83 of 26 October 1983 on applications for aid from the Guidance Section of the European Agricultural Guidance and Guarantee Fund for investment projects in fisheries and aquaculture.
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
1. Applications for aid from the Guidance Section of the European Agricultural Guidance and Guarantee Fund for investment projects in fisheries and aquaculture must include the information and documents indicated in the Annexes.
2. Applications shall be submitted to the Commission in duplicate. Any supporting document other than the actual forms provided for in the Annexes may be presented in a single copy.
3. If the conditions set out in paragraphs 1 and 2 are not met applications shall not be considered.
4. Applications submitted under Council Regulation (EEC) No 31/83 of 21 December 1982 on an interim common measure for restructuring the inshore fishing industry and aquaculture (2) shall also be acceptable in the form laid down in Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2572/78 (3), as amended by Regulation (EEC) No 1898/80 (4).

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.  (1) OJ No L 290, 22.10.1983, p. 1. (2) OJ No L 5, 7.1.1983, p. 1. (3) OJ No L 308, 1.11.1978, p. 19. (4) OJ No L 187, 21.7.1980, p. 1.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 26 October 1983.
For the Commission
Giorgios CONTOGEORGIS
Member of the Commission
